item.title: MIUI OS2.0.208.0.VNNCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Size: 9.6 GB

MD5: 333b284df8c9f8381cb2558c0af9c384

Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Occasional display glitches when opening or closing apps

[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: Status bar wasn't displayed correctly in some cases
